meanings.definition: All existing matter and space considered as a whole; the cosmos.
meanings.sent1: The universe is vast and full of stars.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the universe to learn about space.
meanings.sent3: I feel like the universe is playing a game of hide and seek with me.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a universe of thoughts, each one shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The universe whispered secrets to those who listened closely.

meanings.definition: A particular sphere of activity or experience.
meanings.sent1: In the universe of sports, he excelled in basketball.
meanings.sent2: Her universe revolved around art and creativity.
meanings.sent3: The universe of cooking opened up a whole new world of flavors to her.
meanings.sent4: His universe of knowledge expanded with each book he read.
meanings.sent5: The universe of music embraced her with its harmonious melodies.
